title: The launch of Moxy will disrupt the Indian hospitality market: Ranju Alex, area VP, South Asia, Marriott International
description: Marriott International, the world's largest hotel chain, anticipates another record year in India for 2024, driven by robust demand in leisure and business travel. The company aims to expand its India portfolio to 250 hotels by 2025, including operational and upcoming properties.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
